00013 // Description: Timer controlling the PWM-Signal driving the external Infrared-LEDs
00014 //
00015 //      $Log: irled_pwm.c,v $
00016 //      Revision 1.1  2006/11/12 22:44:17  rainer

00022 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00023 
00024 
00025 #include <avr/io.h>
00026 #include "irled_pwm.h"
00027 
00028 void init_irled_pwm(void)
00029 {
00030                 /** Set Timer0 Control Register
00031                  * 7 FOC0 = 0 -> no force of compare match
00032                  * 6,3 WGM01, WMG00 = 1,1 -> Fast-PWM-Mode
00033                  * 5,4 COM01, COM00 = 1,0 -> Set OC2 at Bottom, clear on compare match 
00034                  * 2,1,0 CS02,CS01,CS00 = 0,1,0 Prescaler of 8 to f_cpu (=>2Mhz fcnt)
00035                  */
00036                  TCCR0 = 0x00 | (1<<WGM01) | (1<<WGM00) | (1<<COM01) | (1<<CS01);
00037                  
00038                  /* initialize Counter register */
00039                  TCNT0 = 0;
00040                  
00041                  /* set Timer2 Output compare register (128 -> 50/50 duty cycle with top=255 */
00042                  OCR0 = 128;
00043                  
00044                  /* set OC2 to act as output */
00045                  DDRB = DDRB | (1<<PB4) ;
00046 }
